item.description:
Mobile-first design ensures your website works well on all devices, starting with the smallest screens.

Why Mobile-First?

Most users access websites on mobile devices, so it makes sense to prioritize mobile experience.

Key Principles

  • Start with mobile layout
  • Use responsive breakpoints
  • Test on real devices

Best Practices

Always test your designs on actual mobile devices to ensure they work correctly.
item.title: Mobile-First Design Principles

item.description:
Learn how to create websites that look great on all devices, from mobile phones to desktop computers.

Mobile-First Approach

Starting with mobile designs and scaling up ensures your site works well on all screen sizes.

Key Techniques

  • Media queries
  • Flexible units (rem, em, %)
  • Flexible images

Testing

Always test on real devices when possible, not just browser dev tools.
item.title: Building Responsive Websites
